ComicInfo.Title: Connection, Part 2 of 2
ComicInfo.Summary: Connection, Part 2 of 2: Two Enterprise crews from different timelines attempt to discover the cause of crew members switching minds with their alternate timeline counterparts.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-30 02:45:41. [CVDB544797] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 15:14:03. [Issue ID 1616848]
